articles.title: At Least 3 Killed In Shooting On Hospital Campus In US' Oklahoma: Police - NDTV
articles.description: At least three people were killed by a gunman at a hospital campus in Tulsa, Oklahoma, on Wednesday, police said, as Americans still grappled with grief and anger over the shooting at a Texas school just over a week ago.
